title: How farming planted seeds for the Internet - Patricia Russac

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: C

title: What is verbal irony? - Christopher Warner

multiple-choice.question: What is verbal irony in literature?

options.label: A

options.text: When the speaker says the opposite of what they mean

options.label: C
options.text: When the speaker is being overly polite

options.label: D
options.text: When the speaker is being too loud

options.label: B
options.text: Verbal irony is when the speaker says the opposite of what they mean, while sarcasm adds a mocking tone

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: Verbal irony is a type of sarcasm, but not all sarcasm is verbal irony

options.label: B
options.text: "Great weather we're having" on a sunny day

options.label: C
options.text: "Awesome job!" said to someone who just rear-ended another car

options.label: D

options.label: B
options.text: Yes, all sarcasm is verbal irony

options.label: D

options.label: D

options.label: B
options.text: To estimate the number of technological civilizations in the Milky Way Galaxy

options.label: C
options.text: To calculate the probability of life on Mars

options.label: D
options.text: To determine the existence of extraterrestrial life

multiple-choice.question: What is R-star in the Drake equation?

options.text: The rate at which stars have been born in the Milky Way Galaxy over the last few billion years

options.label: B
options.text: The fraction of stars that have planets

options.label: C
options.text: The average number of habitable planets in any planetary system

options.label: D
options.text: The fraction of planets on which life actually begins

options.label: A
options.text: It represents the number of planets in the Solar System with life

options.label: B
options.text: It represents the number of times life must originate in the Solar System for it to be considered abundant

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: It represents the number of intelligent species in the Milky Way Galaxy

multiple-choice.question: What is the biggest unknown in the Drake equation?
What does L represent in the Drake equation?

options.label: A
options.text: The rate at which stars have been born in the Milky Way Galaxy

options.label: B
options.text: The fraction of stars that have planets

options.label: C
options.text: The average number of habitable planets in any planetary system

options.label: D
options.text: The longevity factor, representing the average number of years a transmitter operates

multiple-choice.question: According to Philip Morrison, what is SETI comparable to?

options.label: B
options.text: The study of the universe's origins

options.label: D
options.text: The exploration of the Solar System

multiple-choice.question: What is the implication of a successful detection of a signal by SETI?

options.label: A
options.text: That L, on average, must be small

options.label: B
options.text: That N, the number of technological civilizations, must be small

options.label: C
options.text: That L, on average, must be large

options.label: D
options.text: That the Drake equation is incorrect

multiple-choice.question: What is the ultimate question that the Drake equation and SETI research aim to answer?

options.label: A

options.label: B
options.text: Will we destroy our world and its inhabitants after only a brief appearance on the cosmic stage?

options.label: D
options.text: Can we communicate with intelligent life beyond Earth?

title: Why can't we see evidence of alien life? - Chris Anderson

multiple-choice.question: Who famously asked the question "Where is everybody?" in 1950, referring to the lack of evidence of extraterrestrial life?

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: Either answer, whether we are alone or not, is awe-inspiring.

options.label: D
options.text: The search for extraterrestrial life is a waste of time.

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: It gets more amazing as you learn more.
